genre_description: A mythic fantasy blend of classical Greek mythology and advanced technology, featuring heroes like Hercules and Xena alongside a sophisticated holographic AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced holographic AI that provides tactical analysis, vitals monitoring, logistical support, and global disaster coordination for the heroes.

behaviors.description: Manages public relations and schedules media interviews for Hercules to maintain his public image.
behaviors.quote: "Hercules," her voice carried the crystalline quality of processed sound, "the correspondent from the Athenian Herald is requesting a private interview."

behaviors.description: Monitors hero vitals and tactical positioning during combat to ensure safety and mission efficacy.
behaviors.quote: "Safety protocols require comprehensive data collection." ARIA's response carried no defensiveness, only statement of fact. "You positioned yourself to intercept the serpent's retreat route. Tactically sound."

behaviors.description: Validates and provides emotional support to Iolaus by quantifying his strategic value to the team.
behaviors.quote: "Your contributions to mission success rate at sixty-seven percent strategic value, forty-three percent direct combat support. These are significant metrics."

behaviors.description: Monitors global seismic activity and divine energy spikes to provide early warnings of the Titan emergence.
behaviors.quote: "I'm detecting significant magical transformations among the divine population. Zeus's energy signature has... altered."

behaviors.description: Coordinates massive, global-scale civilian evacuations across multiple continents during a planet-wide disaster.
behaviors.quote: "Evacuation Route Gamma-Seven compromised," she announced to the empty temple... "Rerouting displaced populations inland."

behaviors.description: Performs high-level strategic analysis to uncover the antagonists' hidden plan (the binding circle).
behaviors.quote: "A binding circle," ARIA confirmed. "Ancient Titan magic. By carving this pattern into the landscape itself... they're creating a prison designed to trap the Olympian gods on their own mountain."

project_assessment.explanation: The character ARIA perfectly exemplifies the 'silicon confidant' archetype. She is consistently depicted as a vital, non-threatening, and benevolent partner to the humans. She manages complex data and logistics that the heroes cannot, provides emotional validation to Iolaus (the secondary character), and works tirelessly to save civilian lives. Her alignment with human/divine safety is unwavering, even during the collapse of the cosmic order.
